Define Documentation

#define RING_CLEAR_C

Function Documentation

bool ring_clear ( ring_t *  r  ) 

This clear function will reset the head_index and tail_index to 0. The count value is also set to 0. A memset command is used to reset a particular area in memory as well.

Parameters:
*r pointer to ring buffer /
Returns:
boolean result of attempt to add byte
        Example:
        void end_this()
        {
                ring_clear(&receive_ring);
        }
